subject: Re: [junit] saving test results to file
msgSnippet: I suggest looking at the source for the JUnit-related Ant tasks.  writes the output to XML, among others. Good luck. So said  Ralph Pombo
messageBody:
I suggest looking at the source for the JUnit-related Ant tasks.
<batchtest> writes the output to XML, among others.

Good luck.

So said Ralph Pombo <ralfeez@...> on 2003-01-30
--------------------

>I have read about junit.framwork.TestResult in the Cook's Tour but I
>still don't completely understand how to implement it. Does anyone
>have an example of code that shows how to save test results to a file?

>in HTML? other?

J. B. Rainsberger,
